metadata.title: Oshoro Maru cruise 04 to the Bering Sea and Northwestern North Pacific in May - July 1963.
metadata.description:
Data Record of Oceanographic Observation & Exploratory Fishing -  No.8,  March 1964

Observation include meteorological observation, hydrographics observation, sampling of water, analysis of water sample, sampling of marine bacteria, plankton sampling,  sample of fish larvae, sampling of plankton, sampling of bottom sediment, salmon gill-net and eye observations of sea-birds, whales, etc.
